channel.title: MasterHelpers Perfect Compiler V1
channel.description:
I am going to post my compiler because the community is having a hard time with their compilers not working. I am also going to post the topics to prove that other people cannot compile correctly.
What encouraged me to post a "Perfect" compiler?
[b]Wont compile[/b] http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,239707.0.html
[b]i need some help[/b] http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,20372.0.html
[b]can somebody help me with my comiler please?[/b] http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,13058.0.html
[b]Need Biiiiig Help... PLZZ I BEING YOU[/b] http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,18589.0.html
[b]Major Gelp with server plz :)[/b] http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,18260.0.html
[b]Private server help please :([/b] http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,12958.0.html
I could go on and on and on and on with people who need help with their compiler. I really hope this helps out the community and can be stickied.
Compiler Features:
[ul][li].bat file[/li] [li]only compiles when you have the latest java version[/li] [li]redirects you if you do not have latest version[/li][/ul]
I wish I had more to say but...well...here is the compiler :)
[code]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::This Compiler is under no licenses and may:: ::be distributed freely.:::::::::::::::::::::::::: :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit [/code]
-Hope I helped :)

item.title: MasterHelpers Perfect Compiler V1
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

thats not a perfect compiler… THE most ultimate compiler has this inside it:

javac *.java pause

thats all a compiler needs, srsly stop with all this bs “perfect compiler” mine works just as good as any other compiler if nto better, as it goes and finds javac it self rather than beign told a destination so ;p

Read full topic

item.title: MasterHelpers Perfect Compiler V1
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

I am going to post my compiler because the community is having a hard time with their compilers not working. I am also going to post the topics to prove that other people cannot compile correctly.

What encouraged me to post a “Perfect” compiler?

Wont compile

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

i need some help

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

can somebody help me with my comiler please?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Need Biiiiig Help… PLZZ I BEING YOU

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Major Gelp with server plz

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Private server help please

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I could go on and on and on and on with people who need help with their compiler. I really hope this helps out the community and can be stickied.

Compiler Features:

[ul][li].bat file[/li]
[li]only compiles when you have the latest java version[/li]
[li]redirects you if you do not have latest version[/li][/ul]

I wish I had more to say but…well…here is the compiler

::This Compiler is under no licenses and may::
::be distributed freely.::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
[/code]

-Hope I helped

Read full topic
